review: Such a fun and challenging puzzle game! Very simple, easy to master mechanics, but quickly becomes very exciting and difficult to pass every goal in the game. You get stamps for doing a good job and the maps change slightly each time so you there is a lot of replay value. Nice music, solid graphics without requiring much from your computer. Great little game, please check it out. It's my new favorite.

author: {'steamid': '76561197962833830', 'num_games_owned': 1050, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1520292317}
review:
This game is a surprise.  I grabbed it in the Steam sale, and I'm very glad I did.  It's equal parts joy and frustration, and the OCD members of Steam are in for a treat since it is challenging to get all 3 stamps on a first, or even second, try on quite a few of the levels.

There's just enough management of tasks in it (mostly switching tracks and building new ones) to add some deep thought from the player, but it's a great game.

If you can get it in the Sale, grab it.  Even after the sale, it's a very fun game that'll keep you coming back to beat those damn levels with 3 stamps!

author: {'steamid': '76561198200181463', 'num_games_owned': 472, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 1355, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 996, 'last_played': 1516541648}
review:
感觉地图还是有点偏小
进去之后新手指导好像只指导了你怎么建铁路。。。
但是要注意一点，你点击火车头上的那个想去的地方的图标火车会停下来。。。然后有两个选项，左边是原地掉头（真tm黑科技）
右边的是继续走，这样可以做一些火车暂停的支路。
总的来说就是要造大回路，大双向，三角疏导路，然后注意尽可能少的移除房屋。。。森林不怕，森林一般1000，房屋少说3000，有的1w，
然后最开心的就是。。。
卧槽你别往那边走！
你tm快点给我停下来！
要撞车了啊啊啊啊啊啊啊
我去，你就不能少拉两节车厢吗！
反正总的来说还可以。。。打折入的也不贵，
属于休闲类的小游戏，但是相当吃脑力
有的关卡可以说是看脸的，因为很多时候站台生成的地方都不一样
觉得不太好的话可以重新开始然后刷新的看看
建议无聊的时候可以玩玩，不属于主流大游戏。

author: {'steamid': '76561198292307904', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 2767, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1553, 'last_played': 1634381709}

author: {'steamid': '76561198162537278', 'num_games_owned': 173, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1641, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1229, 'last_played': 1630160353}
review:
[H1] Ever wanted to be a train conductor? (Bonus points if you're fat and British, with a top hat) Well, this is the game for you! Plan and operate your Network rail system!  [/h1]

A fun, puzzling, strategic game, which has some nostagic value to the few. :3

When i bought this game, i knew exactly what i was getting into.
I used to play the web-browser game 'Railway Valley' as a child, which i adored. Lots of homework was lied about. I would always get to the 'end' of the technological timeline, and pretty much finish the game, however, even after, i would playthrough it again whenever i had a computer and internet access. 

So when i saw this bump in my queue, i was ecstatic (dissappointed in myself that i didn't find it sooner). New maps, different locations, MANY COLOUR STATIONS?! Whee! Sold. 

So far, i'm enjoying myself thoroughly! The ability to save my progress, to be awarded with STAMPS, is truly magnificent to me. A huge thank you to the devs for making the child in me spark up a little. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198216199864', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 944, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 674, 'last_played': 1510159959}
review:
這是一款火車路線控管策略遊戲，場景由3D構成，
收錄5種風格(歐洲、美洲、蘇聯、日本、德國DLC)做背景，
運輸成功的話車站周邊的建築會慢慢改建擴張，隨著時間的推移，火車也會進化，
各關卡特別成就條件的優缺點其他玩家已經說得很清楚了，不再贅述
設計&操作部分：
鐵軌鋪設建議把會車和閘道空間考慮進去，以因應後期擴站的路線規劃。
火車發車以後可以停車再開或是掉頭再開，前者可用於等候共用路線時的順序，後者是錯過閘道可以反向逆行補救。
系統&限制部分：
運輸收入和拆除費用是用來控制路線經營，定期扣稅是限制軌道擴張和額外派車考量。
系統語言有簡體中文，除了遊戲配樂稍微單調了點，
遊戲風格不會太繁瑣但又需要些策略思考，畫面細節也製作得不錯，值得推薦。

author: {'steamid': '76561198009461441', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1498689752}

author: {'steamid': '76561198087200089', 'num_games_owned': 39, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 775, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 658, 'last_played': 1689326233}
review:
Хорошая игра, но не очень длинная. Покупать по скидке. 
Получить по три печати (аналог звёзд) на последних уровнях не так-то и просто, нужно думать! :)
Есть песочница, там дети могут построить свою железную дорогу без спешки и возможности обанкротиться.
Германия в отдельном паке, чтоб пройти все достижения нужно докупать.

author: {'steamid': '76561198070745874', 'num_games_owned': 324, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1013, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 804, 'last_played': 1524040884}
review:
Özellikle indirimdeyken kesinlikle alınması gereken bir oyun, asla pişman olmazsınız, ama mutlaka indirimde iken alın. 

Tam çerezlik, baş ağrıtmaz, bulmaca çözer gibi tık tık gidiyor bölümler. 

İş yerinde yemek yerken falan oyalanmak için birebir. Ya da şampiyon seçim ekranlarında ve yükleme esnasında bir bölüm daha yaparsınız.

Hemen oynamayacak olsanız bile alın dursun. Oyunun mekaniklerini anlatmaya gerek görmüyorum, sonuçta baş ağrıtmayan, pause ile durdurulabilen, molalarda falan oldukça eğlenmenizi sağlayacak bir oyun.

author: {'steamid': '76561197968127552', 'num_games_owned': 1238, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 674, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 645, 'last_played': 1561688064}
review:
Contrairement à ce que l’on pourrait croire au premier abord, Train Valley n’est pas un jeu de gestion. Ne vous attendez pas à un nouveau Railroad Tycoon ni à un Cities in Motion exclusivement ferroviaire, vous seriez déçu. En fait, Train Valley rappelle pas mal [b]Mini Metro[/b].

Le principe du jeu est très simple. Sur chaque carte apparaissent des gares. Chaque gare a une couleur qui lui est attribuée. Le défi pour le joueur est de conduire un train d’une couleur vers la gare qui lui correspond. Pour cela, vous pouvez tracer les voies, contrôler les aiguillages en temps réel, stopper les trains ou leurs faire faire demi-tour. Simple sur le papier, le jeu se complique rapidement car l’espace de jeu n’est jamais bien grand, que l’argent qu’un train vous rapporte en arrivant dans la bonne gare diminue au fur à et mesure du temps et que les trains finissent par quitter la gare spontanément si vous tardez trop à donner le signal du départ. On notera aussi que plus le temps s’écoule, plus on progresse dans l’Histoire et plus les trains deviennent longs et le rythme rapide. Heureusement que le joueur peut mettre le jeu en pause histoire de respirer un peu.

Ceci dit, bien que le principe soit amusant, il apparaît également rapidement limité dans ses possibilités. Les cartes sont fort petites ce qui limite les possibilités de placements des voies et pour réussir une carte, il suffit de ne pas faire faillite. Accomplir les 3 objectifs secondaires qui sont proposés n’est absolument pas obligatoire. Dommage que le jeu ne propose pas un mode libre avec des cartes plus étendues et que le mode Sandbox soit en fait un entrainement où le joueur décide lui-même de l'ordre d'apparition des gares/ponts/tunnels/trains.

Bref, un jeu amusant quelques heures avant de se dire que ça manque un peu de profondeur pour durer plus longtemps.

author: {'steamid': '76561198172971429', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1677, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1342, 'last_played': 1498925109}
review:
pong！撞车了！Pong! Pong! Pong!又又又撞车了......

全成就后更新一下。

这么多成就里面大概最难完成的是铲除300K建筑完成游戏/ 10辆车同时运行并完成游戏 / 300轨道完成游戏了吧，尤其10辆车同时运行那个。社区界面的指南推荐的是2-6/3-6/2-2，个人是用1-6完成的，原因是有很多一节/两节车。完成这个成就的关键是刷一张好地图。几个站的位置是固定的，但是障碍物和建筑的位置会变。刷一张地图石头没有挡住主要通道，花花草草也长得不碍事，然后按照社区的指南来操作，把短的车停在临时轨道上，攒够车和钱一起开一小会儿距离就好。注意撞车会扣钱，撞完车修路填坑也要钱，以免不够钱破产。

至于其他两个成就，可以日本4-6关刷掉，轨道相对简单狂铺路就行，300K建筑的话钱会稍微有点紧，注意别拆花花草草了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198040488320', 'num_games_owned': 776, 'num_reviews': 198, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1498060147}
review:
Funky little stratedy game, the main aim is managing money while running trains on the lines, you make more money the more trains going, this requires complex track layouts, this complexity creates a surprising ammount of pre planning and building while trying to make the trains reach their goal safely  as quickly as possible.

You can halt trains to let others pass, if you overshoot the turn you can change the direction easily. its forgiving but not overly so, if you fail its on you.

The game imo is a little lite for $10 but on sale for at the most $7 is a good buy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198355188251', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 927, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 924, 'last_played': 1498472660}

author: {'steamid': '76561198079788466', 'num_games_owned': 921, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 398, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 363, 'last_played': 1496007499}
review:
When I bought this game I thought I was in for a fun and relaxing time. Little did I know I had signed up for hell. Albeit the first few levels are pretty straight forward and easy, the steep difficulty curve that swiftly follows out of nowhere is very hard to adapt to. That however is what keeps the game interesting to me. Being a completionist makes it hard for me to leave levels without completing all three of the objectives set out for me. This in turn is both infuriating and wonderful as it makes the replay value for each level much higher for me. I'll replay until I get all 3 stamps per level.

I can see why the game may not appeal to some. It isn't really a simulator. There really isn't all that management when it comes to funding of new trains and things like upgrades. The only thing you need to pay close attention to is changing the arrows on the tracks so that trains go to their correct stations and of course making sure you don't go bankrupt while you are crazily building tracks. There really isn't much micromanaging required to play this game. Avid simulation fans will be mad, avid casual gamers who like only a little bit of management so that the game doesn't tie them down for too many hours at a time will rejoice.

I personally, although annoyed by some levels because they are so damn hard to even complete for a first time, love this game. It's a fun way to kill a bit of time, it isn't too demanding unlike other simulations where you need to focus on a lot of different little things and it is really easy to pick up thanks to the simple mechanics.

Overall, for $10 it is worthwhile adding this game to your collection. Some may beg to differ as the change in difficulty pretty early into the game can make it seem uninteresting and even make it unplayable for some; but personally for me I think it is worth it. I get lots of replay out of it. It's a simple concept with easy controls and it is at times mentally challenging, causing myself to really think out my approach to each level. I personally enjoy a little bit of a challenge when playing games like this so if you feel much the same, I recommend it 100%

author: {'steamid': '76561198159727802', 'num_games_owned': 686, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 270, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 197, 'last_played': 1687726203}
review: Çocuk oyunu gibi gözüküyo ama harbi deli zor karmaşıklık olduğu zaman elin ayağın tutuşuyo ama oyun eğlenceli hırs yaptırıyo insana :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198030977536', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 986, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 893, 'last_played': 1647985278}
review:
Sous son aspect enfantin, il fait travailler les neuronnes et c'est addictif. Le principe et la prise en main sont simples et efficaces, l'enjeu se fait autour de la gestion des trains avec un niveau de difficulté progressif bien pensé.

La difficulté en fait un jeu un peu casual, on n'y passe pas la nuit parce qu'il fait mal au cerveau. On y joue 1h et la suite le lendemain! C'est le prix à payer pour n'avoir aucune phase de jeu passive, on est constamment en train de prévoir le prochain départ, aucun répit pendant les phases de jeu (heureusement on peut mettre pause).

C'est difficile de décrire le plaisir de jouer mais pourtant il est bien là! Je le recommande vraiment aux fans du genre!

review: I'm writing this review because I had great fun and challenge playing Train Valley. As others have said it's a routing puzzle game on the magnitude of 10 hours to beat. You can also play it 10-20 minutes at a time without cliff-hanging. It's like Trainyard meets Conduct THIS! (both ios games). While it has easier routing than trainyard and easier conducting than Conduct THIS!, with the two combined it's a similar overall difficulty level.

author: {'steamid': '76561198381472776', 'num_games_owned': 1195, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 2002, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1598, 'last_played': 1659983012}
review:
Relaxing or stressing, depending on your outlook on the game and eventually on your skills.

Very entertaining and addictive. Too bad it's very short.
Once you've completed all the levels, and perhaps then also completed all the achievements... there is nothing more.
Sure you can sandbox every level or continue playing the levels in perpetuity... but why not implement a map editor and let users share maps?

I love this game and am very happy to see Train Valley 2 in developement!

author: {'steamid': '76561198072849970', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 4798, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2266, 'last_played': 1710781295}
review:
Connect the stations - Send the Train - Toot toot - Connect another station - Send the next train - Toot - no wait, stop, sh*t, reverse, reverse... BOOM - Sh*t - Connect - Send train - send next train - reverse - forward - train - points - train - train - points - connect - train - train - train - 3 green ticks - hold it together - YESSSSSSSSSS!

At the time of writing this review I am 17 hours in and have almost completed the 4th 'Valley' with only the German DLC remaining. Although clearly not as quick at completing this as other gamers, it has been an intense, short, er, ride. So, is the game worth it? Well, yes, frankly. Utterly addictive, frustrating and satisfying depending on what is happening. Ultimately, the satisfaction of getting it right is what keeps me playing - even if I have to have a short break to find serenity before carrying on. 

The controls and gameplay are very simple. It can be played with just the mouse. Although, I do like to keep one finger on the space bar to pause. Laying the track is simple enough and works well enough, although I would like an undo function while paused to correct a mis-layed bit of rail.

Graphics are nice, if basic and should give no problems to lower end systems. The gameplay is smooth and faultless and the sound effects are spot on.

So, IMHO, it is well worth the £6.99 (price correct at time of review) and I cant wait for some more DLC and Train Valley 2. I'd love to see where they take it next.

Cheers.

author: {'steamid': '76561198097538491', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2667, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2194, 'last_played': 1497700652}
review:
I like trains is general, and Train Valley for me hits the sweet spot for being midly addictive and challenging at the same time. As many reviewer's have pointed out, Train Valley has its flaws, but is otherwise a game you can play for 15-30mins and came back to it at a later time.I finished the game but plan on playing through some of stages where I barely made it through or did not get all the bonus items. 

If you liked Flight Control and like trains, you'll love Train Valley.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002557842', 'num_games_owned': 1103, 'num_reviews': 283, 'playtime_forever': 454, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 454, 'last_played': 1494434189}
review:
Gestión de trenes pura y dura. Tienes un modo sandbox demasiado sencillo, con falta de opciones para personalizar la partida para adaptarte el reto, y el modo clásico, el verdadero núcleo del juego. Difícil conseguir el 100% de los sellos. 

Es adictivo porque la fórmula en sí siempre funciona, pero no es el mejor de su género ni de lejos. Mini Metro se lleva este honor, mucho más chill, estético y más refinado a nivel de microgestión y reto.

author: {'steamid': '76561198209816655', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 352, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 333, 'last_played': 1494081081}
review:
Du même style que Mini-metro, dans Train Valley vous devez relier vos gares et acheminer vos trains aux bonnes gares en fonction de la couleur indiquée. 
Le seul coté "gestion" du jeu est que vous avez un budget à respecter pour la pause des voies et la dectruction d'obstacles, vous devez donc gagner un max d'argent en ammenant vos trains aux bonnes destinations.

Au début j'étais sceptique, je me disais "c'est trop facile, c'est un jeu pour enfant, c'est toujours la même chose" mais après quelques niveaux je me suis laissé séduire, quelques paramètres différent d'un niveau à l'autre, les objectifs ne sont pas toujours les mêmes. Et puis ce jeu est agréable à regarder, reposant, ça détend et ça permet de passer un bon moment.

Je ne repproche à ce jeu que 3 choses :
Sa faible durée de vie (une fois tous les succès obtenus je ne pense pas que j'aurai envie d'y rejouer )
Il n'y a aucune statistique IG, ni à la fin de la mission. ça aurait été pas mal de voir combien on a fait transiter de trains, combien on a gagner, combien on a posé de voies etc. D'autant plus que le jeu le calcul dèjà , il ne manquait qu'un simple afficheur!
Enfin, le mode bac à sable dépourvu d'interet selon moi. Mais pour des enfants pourquoi pas!

Je reccomande donc ce petit jeu à tous ceux qui aiment farmer les défis et qui aiment les trains

author: {'steamid': '76561197982803724', 'num_games_owned': 137, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2811, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1433, 'last_played': 1609108594}
review:
Very enjoying and well crafted game. The minimalistic artstyle fits very good and the soundtrack is charming but I have to admit that it can get annoying at times. Not much to say about controls really, the drag-draw system for the tracks is easy enough.

Each level and stage has a new challenge in itself like harsh terrain, bottlenecks, economy or just a lot of stations. Or what about a plane throwing bombs on your tracks? Since I mentioned economy: You constantly have to have an eye on your expensese or you go bankrupt very quickly, some levels are very challenging in this regard adding obstacles that can cost a bunch to remove.

Overall I really love this game. It's very casual in it's basics but can get overwhelming very fast.

But I have to say: It was to easy for me. I had to restart a lot because I was constantly pushing it to the limits (basically hammering that call-a-train button constantly) and so it took me around 20 hours to complete all the levels with all the objectives (while still hammering that button). I personally disliked the levels you weren't allowed to pause the game because there I couldn't request as much trains but it was a nice thing to make it harder.

Yes this game has a lot of replayability (you can set yourself custom objectives like never pause the game or a train) but I would really appreciate there to be more difficult levels in terms of complexity. Some levels had very good approaches like the very last level of Germany combined with multiple tracks from the edge that spawn incoming trains, a little more zoomed out, more tiles and more stations. And more trains :) I'm still hammering that button by the way.

A few things to the UI: It might be deliberately so but I see new stations very late at times, maybe a fireworks animation or just a more distinct sound to give it more attention would be nice. Also at the later levels with a lot going on it's very hard to see where new trains spawned. The icons are somewhat small and static so that I'm just looking for little square icons a lot of the times (rather than playing with the happy little trains).

...

I'm still hammering that button...

author: {'steamid': '76561197970602587', 'num_games_owned': 6364, 'num_reviews': 3660, 'playtime_forever': 221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 215, 'last_played': 1494205439}
review:
https://youtu.be/YjYkNFEZ9-4

Never has the model train set experience required so much micromanagement.  Building tracks to connect stations is the easy part, managing the numerous trains and directing them to their destination turns 'Train Valley' in a complicated plate spinning game.

The early levels take a while to build up steam but once it gets rolling the locations and challenge start to ramp up significantly.

author: {'steamid': '76561198360646791', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 1275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1275, 'last_played': 1494164063}
review:
I bought this game as I'm quite attracted by the reviews, and I think I made a good choice. It looks like a casual game but it's NOT! If you want to pass any level (except the first several levels) with all three missions completed, you have to keep thinking and restarting. I really enjoy this sort of challenging "casual" game!

The visual quality of this game is also very good, and it has some interesting achievements. I highly recommend this game.

Rating: 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198091154414', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1271, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1243, 'last_played': 1704246690}
review:
[h1][b]Review Train Valley[/b][/h1]
Train Valley ist ein Puzzlespiel, bei dem man verschiedene Bahnhöfe miteinander verbindet,  Züge startet und Gleise einstellt.

[h1][b]Gameplay[/b][/h1]
In Train Valley übernimmt man die Kontrolle über ein Eisenbahnnetz. Das heißt der Aufbau und Betrieb. Man kann verschiedenen Streckenführungen ausprobieren um mehrere Züge gleichzeitig und so schnell wie möglich zu den entsprechenden Bahnhöfen zu befördern. Sobald man die Züge losschickt steht man vor der Herausforderung die Weichen richtig zu schalten. Außerdem muss man auf sein Geld achten und Zusammenstöße vermeiden. Soweit, so spaßig. Katastrophen oder andere überraschende Ereignisse gibt es leider so gut wie keine. Train Valley spielt sich vom ersten, bis zum letzten Level recht ähnlich. Daran können auch die Tunnel und Brücken nichts ändern, die außerdem viel zu spät in den Leveln erscheinen und so gerne mal mein gut durchplantes Schienennetz zerstört haben.  

[h1][b]Schwierigkeitsgrad / Anspruch[/b][/h1]
Herausfordernd, gerade die späteren Level. Verschiedene Schwierigkeitsgrade gibt es nicht. Jedoch bietet jedes Level drei - meist recht schwere - optionale Ziele. 

[h1][b]Präsentation[/b][/h1]
Während man sein Schienennetz aufbaut, bewegt man sich von Epoche zu Epoche. Die Shopseite wirbt mit "Der Spieler erlebt den Goldrausch von 1849 und einige Jahre später den ersten bemannten Flug in den Weltraum." Hört sich aber cooler an als es ist. Die Grafik ist sehr einfache und langweilig - ganz im Gegensatz zu dem liebevoll gestalteten Hauptmenü. Das stört aber kaum, gespielt wird (fast) immer in der Vogelperspektive. Der Soundtrack passt perfekt.

[h1][b]Steuerung[/b][/h1]
Funktioniert einwandfrei mit Maus und Tastatur.

[h1][b]Umfang[/b][/h1]
Insgesamt gibt es 24 Level, dazu ein paar optionale Ziele und Errungenschaften. Das war's dann aber auch schon. Train Valley fällt leider alles andere als umfangreich aus. Nach ca. sieben Stunden hatte ich alle Level einmal durchgespielt. Abseits der optionalen Ziele gibt es dann nichts mehr zu tun. Das Endlosspiel ist nicht erwähnenswert. Es ist furchtbar langweilig, sinnlos und dient höchstens als Training für die Level. Für den verlangten Preis geht der Umfang aber durchaus klar.
 
[h1][b]Fazit[/b][/h1]
Train Valley ist ein wirklich spaßiger Puzzler. Es hat seine Ecken und Kanten aber die halten sich in Grenzen. Ich empfinde es als eine klare Kaufempfehlung.

author: {'steamid': '76561198155373010', 'num_games_owned': 25, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 25585, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11769, 'last_played': 1682736475}

author: {'steamid': '76561198324970074', 'num_games_owned': 138, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1620245449}
review: Любите ли вы поезда так, как люблю их я? Если еще нет, то самое время установить Train Valley и открыть в себе страсть к поездам и особенно к строительству железных дорог! Эта игра с оочень простым геймплеем, так что по-началу думаешь "посижу минут 15, тут больше делать-то и нечего". А потом что-то идёт не так и ты обнаруживаешь, что уже третий час напролёт строишь железные дороги и пытаешься не обанкротиться, не допустить аварий и судорожно следишь за тем, чтобы все поезда прибыли в нужный им пункт назначения. Кажется, всё так просто, но стоит только начать...

author: {'steamid': '76561197966720521', 'num_games_owned': 3409, 'num_reviews': 119, 'playtime_forever': 1786, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1786, 'last_played': 1493521372}
review:
La propuesta de Train Valley parece sencilla, guiar a los trenes a sus estaciones respectivas a lo largo de los niveles del juego. Pero para ello deberemos construir y colocar vías de la manera más eficiente que nos sea posible, siempre vigilando el espacio y el gasto necesario para ello, y con un ojo puesto a ratos entre los nuevos trenes que van apareciendo y los objetivos. No es algo tan titánico como suena, pero sí nos obligará a estar atentos y a disponer bien de herramientas tan útiles como la pausa, porque además de construir deberemos controlar las agujas de dirección de las vías. Las colisiones y la llegada de trenes a estaciones equivocadas estarán a la orden del día a medida que los trenes ganen en potencia motora y velocidad, sin contar que varios maquinistas se cansarán de esperar y saldrán de la estación de todas formas, con el peligro que ello supone.

Las áreas geográficas son de lo más variopintas, con niveles temáticos según el país y la época, así como el diseño de los trenes. Habrá por ejemplo una gran diferencia de un tren de vapor a un tren diésel o eléctrico de alta velocidad, y será algo muy a tener en cuenta a la hora de controlar el tráfico o nos podremos llevar más de un susto.

He intentado encontrarle fallos pero no lo logro, quizá como muy cogido por los pelos estaría el hecho de que los niveles son pequeñitos (que no por ello menos complicados), aunque por otra parte se agradece poder alejar la cámara y tener todo a la vista en todo momento. Me parece un juego más que redondo e ideal para pasar el tiempo, y si encima de base te gustan los trenes pues mejor que mejor. En lo personal consiguió que pasaran las horas volando y casi sin darme cuenta le puse bastante empeño para conseguir todos y cada uno de los objetivos avanzados y logros.

Muy recomendado.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044505823', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1791, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1350, 'last_played': 1554281478}

author: {'steamid': '76561198050135590', 'num_games_owned': 1031, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 260, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 195, 'last_played': 1584131130}
review:
Fun and hectic game about controlling trains and very little about building tracks.
You need quick brains, sharp eyes or lots of pausing to be succesful in this game.

I Strongly recommend this game if you like games like: Mini Metro, Airport Madness or Cook Serve and Delicious!
If you are looking for game to build a huge transport empire, this is not the game you are looking for.
It's Puzzle not Tycoon.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979267151', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 2123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1887, 'last_played': 1495113527}
review:
I got it for £2 on offer, that is worth it, but its not worth the full price. 

Good points:

Nice graphics
Nice audio
Easy to understand controls and UI

Bad points:

Trains leave on auto and no way to stop till out of station, causing crashes (Stupid)
The bank hits 0 - game over, even if trains pulling into station to give currency (stupid!!) 
Needs to have auto stop on trains at crossings if one other train is heading pass (again stupid!!!)

If you can get it cheap, its a fun little game but don't expect much. Its more of a puzzle game than a simulator. If you like rail road tycoon games, this isn't like them, so be warned.

author: {'steamid': '76561197977105828', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 962, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 962, 'last_played': 1488229977}
review:
What is Train Valley?

Genre: Top-Down Train Track Puzzle & Strategy
Setting: Establishing and improving railroad lines in different countries, completing special tasks along the way
Difficulty: 3/10 - 7/10 - depends on the selected scenario chapter
Length: 5-10 hours for a campaign walkthrough
Mode: singleplayer only
Similar games: can't name any, sorry


What's good about train valley?

- unique chapters with different artworks (e.g. Russia, Japan, Germany, USA)
- additional special tasks ("challenges") to always keep on improving the railroad network
- easy to get into 
- some levels contain unique specifications you have to deal with
- more simultaneously running, longer and faster trains make up a challenge for your mind!


The negative aspects:

- balancing issues. While one mission can be easy, the next can get surprisingly tough
- trains and stations can't be chosen, they are prespecified by the game (to be fair, that's part of the game mechanics, too)
- the game's music is horrible, and pretty cliché (especially the German tracks)




Result (and summary for those who have no time reading):

Train Valley is a nice puzzling game, using trains as a theme. Depending on your mind skills (hopefully you got some), you will have a challenging or overcharging time fulfilling the missions and special tasks. In general, decent and colourful graphics, varying and motivating special tasks and missions sum up to present the game in a nice and friendly atmosphere. However, the soundtrack is horrible, better turn on your music library while playing - if your mind skills allow you to listen to music and concentrate on the game at the same time.

Recommended!

author: {'steamid': '76561198373504475', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 465, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 385, 'last_played': 1495191830}
review:
起初我以为是款模拟建造类的游戏，但玩了之后才知道是款连接轨道调配火车的。
该游戏画风清新，背景音乐节奏欢快，玩着就很投入，是一款不错的休闲游戏。
游戏分为5个地区（含DLC1个），每关都有高级目标可以完成，
一开始比较简单，但是多玩几个关卡后，想完成所有的目标就难了。
总体游戏还是不错，值得一玩

author: {'steamid': '76561198131420226', 'num_games_owned': 582, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 673, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 498, 'last_played': 1665170676}
review: Difícil, mas muito viciante!

author: {'steamid': '76561198068824513', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 817, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 817, 'last_played': 1493494847}
review:
This is a great game.  This is an efficiency game that is both fun and frustrating at the same time.

Unfortunately, It only took 10 hours to beat.  I'll be getting more levels if they release a DLC.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013723081', 'num_games_owned': 1047, 'num_reviews': 368, 'playtime_forever': 667, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 667, 'last_played': 1480295425}
review:
A puzzle game that involves moving trains from one station to the other. You have to match the correct place they go, or you will either crash the train or fail. You also need to place the correct rails at certain places to make sure the train goes where it is supposed to go. It does involve some strategy.

The game is quite unforgiving to newer players as the tutorial is not very helpful. It does try to help a bit, but the game is very difficult after certain levels.

If you like puzzles, then you can enjoy this game. If you like trains, this game will be even more fun for you.

Recommended for a fun puzzle game. It is also fine for young children to play this game, as it can be used as a teaching tool for strategy and movement and puzzle placement. I also found the puzzle aspect of it very enjoyable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025048256', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 3479, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1609, 'last_played': 1705386998}
review: Solid efficiency game.  Got into it when I tried to beat every objective per level.  At first I wasn't too thrilled but now I just bought the German levels and intend on beating it all the way through.  I wish they had a special stamp for beating all the objective at once though. Great game, worth the money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198277742358', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2111, 'last_played': 1495796637}
review:
一个完全不休闲的休闲游戏，买了以后第二天就玩了12个小时。
还有，我媳妇说BGM太洗脑了，不让我玩了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198286959613', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 432, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 420, 'last_played': 1661767079}
review: 这款游戏适合休闲，但是难度也不算低，强迫症经常会重新开始本地图。但是非常的杀时间，时间在不知不觉中过去。对于一款休闲有些而言，这款非常的成功，好的休闲游戏会让你忘记时间。当你成功的建好了漂亮和充满艺术感的轨道，你会非常的有成就感。另外不得不提这款游戏的BGM，作为休闲游戏这类BGM意外的有种百听不厌的感觉，配合着游戏本身，会让你非常的放松的游玩这款游戏。

author: {'steamid': '76561198000222759', 'num_games_owned': 1362, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 237, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1525133982}
review: 游戏是很好玩，但是为什么配置要求莫名的高，我的GTX760M不是什么好显卡，但是不至于这都玩不起吧

author: {'steamid': '76561197996763361', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1493442225}
review: This game seems like a fun little puzzler, but it has no depth at all. The first couple of levels are fun but that is all there is as all following levels are just more of the same in every aspect. The objectives are uninspired and repeat themselves every other level. There isn't any progression at all, every level you just lay more tracks in a slightly different layout without any new obstacles or gameplay elements added.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054690083', 'num_games_owned': 523, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 345, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 107, 'last_played': 1561916684}
review:
Arkadaşlar selam lokomotif seviyorsanız ve ben bu işin altından kalkarım benim kafa çalışıyor diyorsanız alabilirsin.

Oyun epey güzel ben eğlenceli vakit geçiriyorum arada bir giriyorum ama çok oynayıp tökecezliğince tribe giriyorum.

Oyunun oynanışı hakkında böyle bir video var kanalıma abone olup destek olursanız hoşuma gider ^^

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JdXxdwRSzGI indirimdeyken bir bakın derim ben tüm DLC paketleri ile aldım.

Ayrıca cidden kafa gerektiriyor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068669778', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 6502, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5716, 'last_played': 1493497393}
review: I love the graphics, it's really neat and the childish-realistic balance of it just works perfect for me. I like cute games, this is one of them. Not very challenging if you only go for passing the levels withouts completing the extra goals but it can be rather difficult if you want to complete every chapter with 3 starts (or in this case: stamps). Train Valley is super simple and quick to learn which is a huge plus for a mother of 3 devils with no time to waste. This game is a lovely little brain massage, nice and relaxing. I barely cursed - maybe 3 or 4 times - during the 85hours it took to play through every level (probably I would have been able to do it in 40 hours if my 3 years old has had not insisted on sitting on my lap and assisting me with the mouse coordination.)

author: {'steamid': '76561197968878288', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1756, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 905, 'last_played': 1519736963}
review:
I love this game! I just finished playing it as well as the Germany DLC and I'm gutted there's no more till the sequel in 2018! I love these kinds of puzzle games, this one only has a few minor issues:
- Bankruptcy happens really suddenly and is too harsh - it should at least give you a few seconds to get back into the black.
- You don't know where stations are going to spawn ahead of time.
- The objectives could be a bit more interesting.

But overall I had loads of fun playing this and I'm now looking for other similar games... Well done devs!

author: {'steamid': '76561198076575474', 'num_games_owned': 140, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 99, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 99, 'last_played': 1493317112}
review: Это не симулятор и НЕ стратегия. Это просто ферма, как старые браузерные игры. Использую паузу, вы получаете скучную и очень легкую игру. Без паузы играть чуть интересней, но надоедает уже через 10 мин. Не стоит и 50 р.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032530144', 'num_games_owned': 1482, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1383, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1364, 'last_played': 1554463834}
review:
他のレビュワーが言うようにパズルゲームですね。駅から駅に列車を渡せば到着駅の周辺が発達するって演出がありますがそれほど嬉しいものでもなく・・・。パズルゲームとしては面白かったです。セールで３００円程度なら暇つぶしにちょうどいいと思います。

ちなみに課題で出てくる列車をx本以上走らせると言うものは、Rボタンで追加した列車の総数です。

author: {'steamid': '76561198137350861', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 667, 'last_played': 1652877595}
review:
对于喜欢火车的游戏爱好者来说还是很吸引人的，游戏的关卡就是不断的连接铁轨安排火车，虽然可玩性会随着时间而不断减少，但是初期还是感觉挺不错的。
最大的问题我觉得是没有看到存档功能，一旦出了问题就必须重新开始。

author: {'steamid': '76561198106657336', 'num_games_owned': 1170, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1543, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 422, 'last_played': 1542317254}
review:
Sympatická oddechovka z kategorie micro/time management. Na mapě je vždy několik stanic kde se objevují vláčky které chtějí dojet do jiné stanice. Na hráči je stavět koleje, přehazovat výhybky, odesílat vláčky ve správný čas aby se nesrazily, ale zase aby dojely co nejdřív. Podle mě přesně ten typ hry když mám chvíli čas dát jedno/dvě kola a pokračování zase někdy. Potěší i detaily v menu - zapomeňte na tradiční level 1-x a 1-3 hvězdičky za splnění - tady jsou jednotlivé kola různé poštovní známky a bum tam razítkem.
Jediné co bych hře vytknul je jistá hardwarová rozežranost / horší optimalizace - vzhledem k tomu co v té hře vlastně je bych čekal, že to na nižší detaily poběží prakticky na čemkoliv a ono ne, minimální požadavky tady opravdu plus minus sedí.
Pro úplnost - hra pořízena v akci za 3eura a moje doporučení.

author: {'steamid': '76561198268311767', 'num_games_owned': 157, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1045, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1601726700}

author: {'steamid': '76561197995756848', 'num_games_owned': 150, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1493165564}
review:
Good game for 2,99€

Easy to learn and play, nice simple game.

Played 2 hours and then find out difficulty curve came too steep. Just can't bang my head to wall anymore. That's it for me, probably not going to play more hours.

I recommend this if you're interested in casual puzzle games.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978319031', 'num_games_owned': 288, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1493147564}
review:
Le jeu n'est pas mal en soit, mais passé une demi-heure on s'ennuie, rien de neuf, les niveaux deviennent juste super durs et on ne s'amuse plus. Dommage, le concept était pas mal mais il aurait fallu que le jeu évolue sur autre chose qu'uniquement la difficulté.

A noter que je m'attendais plus à un jeu de gestion/simulation et qu'en réalité c'est plus un jeu de casse tête.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116541741', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 384, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 305, 'last_played': 1493247746}
review:
Looks nice, plays nice - for a while. CONGRATULATIONS - you are among a group of programs I can count on one hand that managed to hard-crash Windows 10. I am SO freaking glad I waited until this was on sale for less than $3 to buy.  

Now say it with me: "I will never write a program loop that can potentially loop infinitely without allowing indows events to process!" Yup - thats all you have to do - in any loop which could get stuck because you assume that an exit condition Will occur, put in a call to Application.DoEvents - it doesnt have to be in Every iteration of the loop - you could always add a counter or check system time and check the milliseconds MOD some value.

author: {'steamid': '76561198130527428', 'num_games_owned': 405, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 848, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1653903789}

author: {'steamid': '76561198193833431', 'num_games_owned': 767, 'num_reviews': 176, 'playtime_forever': 203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 203, 'last_played': 1476608289}
review:
Train Valley - замечательная игра про строительство железных дорог.
Строительство железных дорог тут не по привычному шаблону всем - необходимо прокладывать её из города А в город Б, к-е будут появляться на каждом уровне так, чтобы не врезались и сократить время в пути, ведь за задержку снимают штраф в игровой валюте. Переключать стрелки на путях просто необходимо вовремя.
На каждом уровне присутствует своя уникальность - это связано с определёнными направлениями в развитии разных стран.
Игра проста, интересна, занимательна. И если есть любители подудеть, то определённо стоит её брать.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040377962', 'num_games_owned': 617, 'num_reviews': 169, 'playtime_forever': 1491, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1491, 'last_played': 1492842341}
review:
Отличная игра, в меру сложная и расслабляющая. Приятная сочная картинка и очень аддитивный геймплей, который местами заставляет попотеть (я проходил на все 3 задания за одну миссию, при фейле одного из них - рестартил). 
Каких-то видимых недостатков, или раздражающих моментов не нашел. Всё именно так, как должно быть в такой игре.

Пример хорошей инди-игры. 9/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988974367', 'num_games_owned': 502, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 432, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1529415945}
review:
很好玩的鐵道小品，你不只要建造順暢的鐵路
還需要控制火車的流程

一不小心碰撞就會毀掉軌道跟貨品
每個關卡都有不同的挑戰任務，要三項全部達成非常有難度

而鐵道的建造常常會讓你一破再破重新的不斷打造出你覺得最棒的路
推薦購買，非常好玩又花時間！

author: {'steamid': '76561198127596898', 'num_games_owned': 49, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1454217338}
review:
My Grandfather smoked his whole life. I was about 10 years old when my mother said to him, "If you ever want to see your grandchildren graduate, you have to stop immediately." Tears welled up in his eyes when he realized what exactly was at stake. He gave it up immediately. Three years later he died of lung cancer. It was really sad and destroyed me. My mother said to me, "Don't ever smoke. Please don't put your family through what your grandfather put us through." I agreed. At 28, I have never touched a cigarette. I must say, I feel a very slight sense of regret for never having done it because this game gave me cancer anyway.

This was a prank, but I really don't like this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198284357725', 'num_games_owned': 1283, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 414, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1705240586}
review:
Train Valley est un simulateur de gestion de lignes ferroviaires, un peu comme Mini-Metro ou vous devez dessiner simplement les lignes de chemins de fers entre les différentes gares ainsi que la circulation des trains. Il va aussi falloir faire attention au budget car construire des lignes coûte cher, et on gagne de l'argent en faisant arriver les trains à la bonne gare. 

Côté graphisme, le jeu est très joli et nous fais voyager dans l'histoire ferroviaire, on démarre en Europe, on voyage en Amérique et on finit dans un univers plus futuriste au Japon.  Le jeu est facile à prendre en main, notamment grâce à un système de couleur bien pensé. 

Mais il ne faut pas se fier à l'aspect très joli du titre puisque le jeu est plutôt difficile. En plus de finir le niveau, il faudra pour recueillir les collectables, finir le niveau avec certaines conditions, ce qui rallonge la durée du titre. Un plus non négligeable est l'aspect bac-à-sable qui permet de se laisser aller. 

Un très bon jeu de gestion, original avec une difficulté croissante et une bonne durée de vie. Si vous voulez en savoir un peu plus, n'hésitez pas à lire mon article sur le sujet : [url=https://laplumedelamesange.wordpress.com/2017/02/23/train-valley-ou-la-gestion-des-lignes-ferroviaires-a-travers-les-ages/] Train Valley ou la gestion des lignes ferroviaires à travers les âges [/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198085160303', 'num_games_owned': 108, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1584124951}

author: {'steamid': '76561198026311016', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 707, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 472, 'last_played': 1563641796}
review:
This is a neat little game! Many train games are focused on the driving, speed, and so on. The game here is more equivalent to a model train set, wherein your responsibility is designing the layout of the railroad network and dispatching trains to their appropriate destinations. I've played through about 12 levels so far and many have posed a great challenge for me! But there is not a moment that I am not having fun. The background music can quickly get a bit repetitive, so I would recommend turning that off after a little while. Once I completely play through the game, I plan to go back again and ensure I pass all of the levels _with_ the bonus objectives.

All in all this is a great game. It requires careful planning, precision execution, and a computer with only decent spects.

review:
The demo managed to hold my attention for more than 30 minutes which was enough to convince me to plonk down some dosh to get the full game. Great little puzzler and like others have mentioned, it did remind me of Flight Control but with trains. Well worth considering, especially when on sale.

Note: I did originally plan on playing this on a touch screen enabled device, and while it did work mostly, I found that having a nice gaming mouse enhanced the experience that much more.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969722720', 'num_games_owned': 1094, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 1047, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 622, 'last_played': 1491822759}
review:
Train Valley might look like a 'casual' game, but it's far from easy, and approaching it as a loose, casual game will only bring you grief! You need to make friends with the 3-step speed controls and the Pause button in order to succeed. That's because although laying your track is half the battle, the funds to build and destroy it come from the deliveries you make, and crashes and wrong destinations all impact your income. In other words, the main fight here is with scheduling your trains. 

The game mechanics are fairly intuitive, and of course the more you play, the more you understand. In this way, Train Valley is both rewarding and frustrating, because there are still some things that require some time and attention to understand. One key concept here, which I'm still not entirely sure about really, is of your trains taking off of their own accord once the cargo value timer has dropped to a certain point. This appears as a set of tiny figures above each train, and if I have only one complaint with the game, it's that this essential bit of information is too small to see comfortably. There is a handy option to scale the UI up and down, although the figures don't scale with it.

The feedback between your tack layouts and the efficiency of your scheduling is pretty tight -- get one right, and the other will work so much the better too. With successive timely deliveries made, your cash reserves will be able to cope with the odd crash or mis-direction. In the end though, it's easy to over-spend, so walking that tightrope between track design and scheduling is, again, crucial.

As much as Train valley is about quickly clicking on your junctions and switches, the game definitely gives your brain a good workout, in much the same way that Bridge Constructor-type games do. I think it's well worth the 10 Euro Steam price, although I got mine for 2 Euros from Bundlestars, which is an absolute steal, frankly. Great game, and I highly recommend it.

review: A great puzzle game that can easily lead to you spending an entire afternoon playing. The premise is simple, guide trains to the station of the same color by switching track junctions to the direction they want to travel. But it quickly becomes more hectic as you have mulitple trains to the same station, new stations opening up that need you to lay new track to and if that wasnt enough there are three optional objectrives for each level. A great game at a great price!

author: {'steamid': '76561198028927205', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 740, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 534, 'last_played': 1544288944}
review: Jeu extrêmement sympathique. Un croisement de puzzle / gestion où il faut guider les trains jusqu'à leur gare de destination en évitant les accidents et en remplissant certaines conditions (gagner tant de dollars, ne pas arrêter de trains, etc.). Néanamoins, le jeu se révèle assez simple une fois qu'on l'a bien pris en main.

author: {'steamid': '76561198148030287', 'num_games_owned': 1149, 'num_reviews': 200, 'playtime_forever': 538, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 167, 'last_played': 1490001541}
review:
How can someone not recommend this game!
If you ever wanted to know what it is like having your own trainset at home but spending all that cash held you back? 
Than this is your game.

It is a addicting management game
and when all your trains are moving on that perfectly thought out track.
You feel like a boss.
However when things turn into chaos, you will give curse yourself.

There aren't really any negatives besides one annoyance which is the difficulty of drawing the tracks. Sometimes it is hard to guide them where you want them to go.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999889274', 'num_games_owned': 435, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 909, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 706, 'last_played': 1645764521}
review: One of the simplest games and yet one of the most both enjoyable and frustrating at the same time.  It was recommended by a friend 2 days ago and I haven't stopped playing since.  Build a track, set the track direction and let the train run.  That's it.  That is, until you have trains going everywhere all at the same time, then it gets pretty frantic.  Great game, highly recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081245180', 'num_games_owned': 636, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1764, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 532, 'last_played': 1629526063}
review:
Bitte beachten, es handelt sich um keine Wirtschaftssimulation, es werden "lediglich" Schienennetze gebaut und man muss Züge zum gewünschten Ziel steuern (durch Verstellen von Weichen, Anhalten von Zügen). IIn jedem Level kommen laufend neue Bahnhöfe dazu und pro Level ist die Landschaft anders.

Mir hat es bis jetzt sehr großen Spaß gemacht, Preis/Leistung ist genial.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052389780', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 2577, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 977, 'last_played': 1594738115}
review:
I have been having a blast with this puzzle game. Mostly because I found out there is a pause game button, so I can plan my moves without rushing everything.

The game has been very stable, no crashes. Some people have complained about the collision not working correctly, but I suspect that is a problem with their computer, or they are not paying close attention to their trains movement, because I am on the 3rd level and have had no such problems. I have crashed trains, but that was my fault, not the games.

The game is very replayable, as each level starts with different train stations at the start. And its also random which station trains will start at. Like most puzzle games, you can replay levels as much as you like, to better your score or just for the fun of it.

Overall, I recommend the game to anyone who likes puzzle type games. If you like it fast paced, then don't use the pause key. ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561197996122610', 'num_games_owned': 245, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1990, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 579, 'last_played': 1517701385}
review: Great little game. It can be an incredibly frustration game at times because it gets challenging when you have a lot of stations, trains and switches to look after. This is by no means a bad thing. I've quite enjoyed the challenge. If you're a fan of trains and puzzles then this is definitely worth checking out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066802209', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 1303, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1303, 'last_played': 1488549119}

author: {'steamid': '76561198336285489', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1488203287}

author: {'steamid': '76561198032513298', 'num_games_owned': 264, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 464, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1493698627}
review:
Незамысловатая аркада-головоломка про доставку поездов до нужных станций в условиях нехватки места под ж/д полотно и (иногда) денег. 
Игра не сложная. На уровень три задания,  которые можно выполнять не одновременно.
Однако, интереснее ставить самому себе задачи, типа "всегда направлять поезда на нужные станции" и "пройти уровень сразу на три печати".
В целом,  рекомендую.

author: {'steamid': '76561197973387047', 'num_games_owned': 2924, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 5695, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5107, 'last_played': 1501744257}
review:
I enjoy "Train Valley" very much!  Looks good.  Plays good.  And is quite challenging!
I even took the time to complete all of the levels in the main game all with three stamps.
Highly recommend!

Have also purchased and played most of the "Germany" DLC.
The DLC is quite a bit more difficult and buggy.  The DLC has frozen up on me numerous times.
The "Germany" DLC felt rushed compared to the main game.
Would only recommend the "Germany" DLC if you loved the main game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197966378507', 'num_games_owned': 2689, 'num_reviews': 172, 'playtime_forever': 1376, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1226, 'last_played': 1504941813}
review:
駅と駅を線路で繋ぎ、列車を目的の駅まで走らせる。電車ゲームのような顔をしているが、シミュレーションゲームではなく、実際にはパズルゲーム。

線路の敷設や列車の追加には資金がかかる。列車を目的の駅まで導くと資金が増える。線路を引くだけでなく、ポイントの切り替えを行って列車の行き先をリアルタイムにコントロールする必要もあるので、けっこう忙しない。

ゲーム中はスペースキーでいつでもどこでも一時停止することができる。基本、止める→ポイント切り替え、の繰り返しになっていく。ここは一時停止に制限を設けるとかしてもよかったような気がする。

マップは予め準備されたものが24個？くらい。マップごとにサブミッションもあるが、それもクリアしてしまうとすることがなくなってしまう。これもまたランダムマップでもあればもっと楽しめたかもしれない。惜しい。

★★★★☆

author: {'steamid': '76561198003053483', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 4086, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2960, 'last_played': 1654631247}
review:
This is a great mini-game providing lots of fun for at least 20 hours. New price is €9,99 so this is great value, also. Your goal is to send all trains to their specific station. Don't make a mess crashing them or sending them to the wrong station. Different level with different tasks, so your gameplay changes every level. Not too hard to get all medals. 

The biggest plus for me: I didn't found a single bug, well coded piece of software (or app, as you freaky young people would call it)!

Very good gameplay, neat graphics, all you need. And you don't even need to be a train maniac to love this game. Grab it!

review:

Si se le pudiera poner alguna pega es su precio: 10 euros es mucho dinero para lo que básicamente es un juego de tablet. Pero completamente recomendable comprarlo en oferta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198354658421', 'num_games_owned': 810, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2207, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2207, 'last_played': 1488985706}
review:
比较喜欢模拟类的游戏，于是趁着杉果打折入了
万万没想到啊mmp
这特么是个策略游戏！Are you kidding me？
某些关卡的变态要求分分钟把人逼疯
进错站了？重来！
调度的车太多看不过来了？重来！
撞车了？重来！
要破产了？重来！
……
目标——三个邮戳
玩完4部分不过瘾，火速入了德国
你可能会为了3个邮戳重开了某个关卡N次后
还不过
但是相信我，再来一次吧  23333

小心谨慎把握好时机（发车时间）规划好路线（扳好岔道）注意力高度集中（暂停键能救命）
最重要的就是耐心！耐心！耐心！

全3星通关意犹未尽…
期待TV2！

author: {'steamid': '76561197998156934', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 856, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 850, 'last_played': 1511021201}

author: {'steamid': '76561198012902673', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 380, 'playtime_forever': 363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 363, 'last_played': 1485390647}
review: Train Valley is a Mini Metro-esque puzzle game disguised as a railroad management game. You have to manage money and all that, but it's really about plotting out your railroads, switching the junctions, and managing the trains all moving at once. It makes for some really challenging puzzles, and the cute aesthetic brings it together nicely. It does take a while to figure out that streets have no real impact on gameplay, however.

author: {'steamid': '76561198221206804', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 209, 'playtime_forever': 1200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1191, 'last_played': 1545558060}
review:
皆さんが書いているようにパズル要素の強いプラレールゲーム。
やるたびに地形が微妙に変わるので、
何度でも楽しむことができる。

デフォルメ気味の車体や絵本のような風景は嫌いではないが、
自分にとってのマイナス要素をあげると、
難易度があがるにつれて慌ただしいゲームになってしまうこと。
列車の種類はたしかにあるのだが、
もっと明瞭に（たとえば準急、急行、特急のような区別）を出してほしかった。

他の人のレビューを見てもわかるのだが、
オススメしている人でもほとんどが10時間～20時間。
のめり込む……にはちょっと足りない。

ただ、面白いけどね。

author: {'steamid': '76561197982658491', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 171, 'playtime_forever': 332, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 322, 'last_played': 1495400711}
review:
This is actually a surprisingly-charming little real time strategy/puzzle game.

Nicely paced, you can pause and plan at any time, but you have to keep to juggle a lot of variables in your head at once. Planning out an order of operations for the trains is an evolving challenge, since you can request virtually as many trains to manage as you want -- a lovely self-balancing system.
The objectives are all optional, and so the game easily scales in difficulty. Grade school children and adults alike can play the game and progress through the maps while feeling challenged.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027103160', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 118, 'playtime_forever': 748, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 701, 'last_played': 1484915748}

author: {'steamid': '76561198028441712', 'num_games_owned': 1349, 'num_reviews': 147, 'playtime_forever': 1338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 989, 'last_played': 1485673956}
review:
[h1]86 / 100[/h1]

Looking at [b]Train Valley's (TV)[/b] store page a while back, I overlooked this game as a basic train simulator, when in fact it plays more of a puzzle game with some real-time strategy elements thrown in! [b]TV[/b] uses some fairly simple but effective rules. Lay a track between stations, and deliver as many trains without incident, as quickly as possible. You can choose where to lay the track, purchased from the earnings you get from train deliveries, and trigger when the trains depart. These are colour coded to let you know where to send the train. You can also rush trains by purchasing them for bonus score & turn trains around or stop them.  Your money is always going down so the pressure is on!

Where tracks overlap, you have get a switchboard, that you can reposition between your alternative track paths. On complex track layouts, this can be quite challenging to keep every train going where they should especially when you start to juggle multiple trains enroute at a single time. Good planning is a must!

Puzzle mechanics are easy, but increase exponentially as paths multiply. As you progress through the 20 scenarios [i](+5 more in the DLC)[/i] across 4 seasons, the difficulty is increased by putting more obstacles in your way, increasing the frequency of the trains & also other level specific challenges. Each level has 3 bonus goals to achieve as well, which can be done on multiple playthroughs. When things get too hectic, you can pause the timer giving you a moment to regroup. Although the maps are small, there is ample variety in the challenges presented, they are thoughfully designed, balanced & do not become stale.

Sound design is good, providing clear audio feedback to the actions occurring on screen, but these can get repetitive [i](especially the ding of the train leaving for me)[/i]. Levels are clear to navigate and laying track is generally an easy task. Occasionally, you can lay a track as your mouse moves slightly to the adjacent square, causing issues laying things the wrong way. It would be good to be able to demolish for the same cost if the timer hasn't been resumed to recover costs [i](as income is limited)[/i].

Likewise, the financial impact of two trains colliding plus the many squares of track loss often spells doom & essentially the end for your level. It seems a bit excessive at times, and can frustrate, as can that random train departure who has just got in the way of everything! Thankfully, most levels are pretty quick to balance this out to a degree.

Despite these stress points, it has been hard to drag myself away from [b]TV[/b] for very long. Still trying to beat some of the later levels in the German DLC. It is highly addictive once you get a few levels in and will continue to challenge your time management & coordination skills all the way to the last level.


[url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/6857016/]If you enjoyed reading this review, please follow [u]True Blue Reviews[/u] for more recommendations![/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198007513026', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 433, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1484254875}
review:
I really tried hard to like this game. I played the game once and didn't like it. A few months later I decided to give it another try because I really like train games. I've put hundreds of hours into Railroad Tycoon, Avalon Hills 1830 and many other train games.

Unfortunately Train Valley is one of the few train games I don't like. To be honest, it is terrible. The on screen instructions are confusing - for example the first pop up tells you to create a track by joining green tiles. What green tiles - oops, the forget to tell you to first click the tiny track construction icon.

Similarly I never managed to meet some goals because I had no idea how to do what the game asked. Dispatch 3 additional trains - I assume I click on the dispatch train icon, but nothing happens. At some point I do manage to dispatch a train but I have no idea how and I can't dispatch the required 3 trains.

None of this would matter much if the game were fun, but it isn't. Sending trains out of stations and switching track, how exciting. Boring and confusing sums up this game, worst train game I've played in ages, maybe ever.

author: {'steamid': '76561197981864933', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1799, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1799, 'last_played': 1483739595}
review:
A Strangly Addictive Game

I bought this game looking for something like the old-schoold game Atrain (DOS) and when I first launched it, I was disapointed as it wasn't like that. But that's okay as it never was promised as such and I didn't read the description before purchasing it. With the amount of positive reviews it has, it was a sure buy - and it has trains.

I was instantly hooked on the game once I got the overall concept and how the game worked. It's a game like none other I have played despite having the same concepts as others. But it is unique in the method of which everything is applied.

Train Valley is a simple game as-is, but that doesn't make it easy. It can be a very challenging game and you'll spend a lot of time getting those last few stamps. With a relative small map, you have to build train tracks between given stations and change the tracks to direct your trains towards the proper station. That in itself would be easy if you had unlimited money, time, and space - but you don't - and that's where the challenge lies.

It would have been nice with a few more levels and maybe a few bigger ones, but for a sales price it's more than enough content and you can have hundreds of hours entertainment for very little money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001458254', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 1264, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 654, 'last_played': 1644521186}
review:
Was ist Train Valley?
Genau das wonach es aussieht: Das Spielen mit Modellzügen in einem vorgegebenen Level.
Dabei verlegt man Schienen und stellt ständig an Weichen um möglichst viele Züge pro Zeit von A nach B zu bringen.
Jedes Level hat eine Zeitbegrenzung, für jedes zusätzlich erreichte Ziel (keine Unfälle, Schienenänderungen, Falschfahrten, ...) gibt es Bonusstempel.
Aber manche Level sind schon von Haus aus zum Haare ausraufen schwer (6 Stationen getrennt von einem Fluss mit 1 Brücke darüber). Und es sind nicht nur die Level, mit der Zeit kommen unterschiedlich schnelle/lange Züge etc. dazu.
Dabei muss man ständig finanziell über Wasser bleiben und mit möglichst zeitnah absolvierten Fahrten genug Geld für neue Schienen zusammen zu bekommen.
Jedes Level ist zwar beim Wiederholen grundlegend gleich, allerdings variiert die Reihenfolge spanender Stationen und Fahrten.
Nach spätestens 20 min ist man im Bau- und Weichenstell-Fieber um endlich die 3 Sterne am gegenwärtigen Level zu schaffen.
Die Herausforderungen sind dabei abwechslungsreich, sinnvoll, herausfordernd aber fair.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095329168', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 111, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1478962918}
review:
決められた駅と駅を線路で結びつつ、電車をマネージメントしてクリアしていくのですが、
シミュレーションに見せかけた、[b] RTSパズルゲーム[/b]です。

衝突事故を起こさないようにポイントを切り替え、規定数をクリアしていくのですが、
一時停止できるとはいえ、汽車は一定時間でスタートするので、結構ハラハラ・ドキドキします。

author: {'steamid': '76561198035050953', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 3000, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2423, 'last_played': 1693150254}
review:
+ Clean interface
+ Good concept
+ Casual Gaming possible because of "Pause"-Button
+ Trains with different speeds and length
+ Challenging Levels with 3 Goals that can be reach single or combined
+ Colorblinde Mode (developer helped me with this info)

- Trains running over switches change the switch to driving direction of the train
- Sandbox mode is nice but a Level Editor and sharing Levels over Workshop would have been great
- I like playing in Windowed-Mode but wenn I miss the Pause Button and hit the Window X the Game is just quits (I know I could use the Keyboard to Pause but I like to use the mouse)
Hitting the X with other games in windows mode often just pauses them or brings up an options menu

author: {'steamid': '76561198015038017', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 3293, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1051, 'last_played': 1485247484}
review: Train Valley met my expectations.  I find the videos and screenshots to be misleading, as they feature zoomed in views of the map.  I play zoomed all the way out so I can always see the entire map.  I don't see any advantage to zooming in.  Each level starts with two or three stations.  You decide where the track goes.  Trains appear at random stations, and you need guide each train to its desired destination.  As the level progresses, more stations appear.  You have much more control than in Mini Metro, and consequently you do more micromanagement - mostly toggling switches to try to route trains where you want them to go.  On the plus side, this means that when things go wrong, it is almost always your fault, whereas success in Mini Metro depends more on luck and chance.  More trains + more track + more switches = more complexity.  You can also call in extra trains for extra points.  The challenge is designing and discovering track layouts that are easy to manage.  Some of the UI elements could be improved (see my comment in the Steam discussions), but I have adapted to the unfortunate UI deficiencies.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006794286', 'num_games_owned': 79, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1616, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1642247127}
review:
Train Valley is a great little game, if you just want a nice end to a day, and do something, just to unwind alittle, then i can wholeheartedly reccomend this game for you. 
It has:
1 Trains
2 Puzzles
3 Cool Music (which my wife says is very relaxing so im allowed to keep the sound on)
4 Extra depth (you lose if you go bankrupt - so its not just moving trains)
5 Nice Gfx.
6 Trains

all in all 10/10 for effort, looking forward to train valley 2!

először nehéznek tűnik, de ki lehet bírni. nekem furcsa volt, hogy elidítja magától is a vonatokat, nem mindíg várja meg, hogy én tegyem ezt meg. és az is, hogy nincs vége azonnal ütközés esetén. igazából csak csődbemenni nem szabad, az nem számít hányan halnak meg közben. nem erre számítottam, igy elsőre nem is értettem meg mit akar a játék. valójában csak túl kell élni a pályákat.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961951106', 'num_games_owned': 1565, 'num_reviews': 289, 'playtime_forever': 805, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 789, 'last_played': 1482657383}
review: Going into it, having only looked at the title and a few screenshots I expected a watered-down version of Railroad Tycoon, but still an economic strategy. Instead I got an arcade game where the core of the gameplay is laying tracks and operating junctions so that nothing crashes. But I'm far from disappointed. There is something incredibly satisfying about playing with trains and operating the switches, listening to all the choo-choos and occasional explosion. It seems the game successfully evoked subconscious, positive feelings of playing with model trains when I was younger. Which almost guaranteed that I love it, unless there would've been some hiccup with the technical particulars (ex. graphics, sound). Luckily those are also spot on and while not very impressive or flashy, they keep in theme with the playful atmosphere. The only issue is a nasty crash when closing the game, but there are workarounds (alt-f4 followed by ctrl-alt-del). Highly addictive and recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007441072', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 2299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1293, 'last_played': 1511434270}

author: {'steamid': '76561198116675491', 'num_games_owned': 662, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 896, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 659, 'last_played': 1562673651}
review:
Неплохая игра для небольшого времяубития. Сначала думал что нужно как в обычных стратегиях развиваться, но оказалось что нужно правильно и грамотно строить пути и отправлять поезда, что бы не врезались. Каждая задержка поезда снимает деньги за доставку до 0. Купил со скидкой,рекомендую покупать так же. Т.к. есть вероятность, что быстро надоест. Меня хватило первые разы на 4 часа ) однообразие на всех уровнях. 

Чем дальше уровень, тем сложнее. Каждые уровни привязаны к определенной стране с ее выдающимися событиями. В СССР это был запуск ракеты, в Японии какието игры зимние

review:

review: Train Valley is a simple but solid game. That gives you a good amount of fun and hours to play. It's nothing really special, but has his moments where your taciticel knowledge and engineerity is needet. I had a lot of fun playing it, but now that I finished all levels (plus DLC) and got al achivments the game has come to an end.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088007517', 'num_games_owned': 534, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 727, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1484178965}
review:
This game’s Steam description doesn't make it justice. Many people, including me, bought Train Valley expecting something on the vibes of Railroad Tycoon, which it isn't.

Although, Train Valley is a very nice and challenging puzzle game. You must plan your tracks ahead, monitor your switches, everything to make every train arrive to their destinations in time, preventing collisions on the way.

It's simple and easy to learn, but demands rapid thinking and decision-making at later levels. I do recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198272621526', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 192, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 172, 'last_played': 1486573009}
review:
Velmi nenáročného dospělého uživatele může zabavit. Ale je spousta jiných titulů, které to dokážou lépe. 
Hra se podle mě hodí pro děti. Tedy hodila by se.
Nicméně pro děti je to bohužel totálně nehratelné, není tam žádný [b]easy mód[/b]. Kluk (6let) mi u toho brečel, když se mu vláčky začaly rozjíždět samy. Pausovat to co 5 sekund není řešení. I já mám co dělat to uhrát.

Za mě super potenciál pro děti, pokud dají nějaká easy mód bude to skvělá hra pro děti.
Nyní nedoporučuji ani náhodou!

author: {'steamid': '76561198259727974', 'num_games_owned': 210, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1480135744}

author: {'steamid': '76561197971468531', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 918, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 496, 'last_played': 1704741527}
review:
The perfect little time killer. You can jump on for 10/15 mins or find yourself an hour later still glued to this. To call it a spinning plates game would do it a disservice.

Gameplay involves deciding where and how to lay tracks then managing the track switching to make sure the trains go to the correct destinations. It’s all about laying efficient routes (financially and practically) and juggling the train journeys between points. You're under a time limit - the longer the trains take, the less money you earn. You have a finite amount of money to lay tracks. Destroying buildings/trees to lay tracks costs more. These time and money pressures add up to make a well balanced challenging little game.

A simple premise, it's addictive and moreish. This is more puzzle game than train sim..shame it's not on mobile.

Kudos to the devs!

author: {'steamid': '76561198192883790', 'num_games_owned': 657, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 775, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 543, 'last_played': 1665878518}
review:
Puzzle game on when to start/stop trains to make the most money and accomplish the goals without crashes. You get to build some tracks and destroy some scenery but it is a brain teaser puzzle game first and foremost. Design your tracks with loops to allow you to pass trains past each other and create intricate switches to complete tasks. It is a fun addictive game that doesn't always require alot of time to just relax with.

Not a resource simulation but still very fun with cool environments and visuals for a puzzle game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051892158', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1590, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 980, 'last_played': 1514229522}
review:
So addictively fun to play.

Deceptively simple, just the right amount of difficulty to keep you retrying failed objectives, over and over again. :)

This game's not without side effects though. I found myself dusting off boxes looking for my 80's N gauge train set?!

author: {'steamid': '76561197966633643', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 835, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 537, 'last_played': 1616893285}
